allorsUnifiedGood.name: CHARLATTE CBL2000D
allorsUnifiedGood.description:
Charlatte Beltloader Model CBL2000D is capable of servicing all types of aircraft with door sill heights ranging from 40” up to 172”.  
Power for the main drive is supplied by a diesel engine (ISUZU Model CS240) which gives the unit a running speed of 20 mph (32 kmph).

brand.name: CHARLATTE
brand.description:
Placed among the world's leading manufacturers of handling equipment for industrial and airport use, CHARLATTE MANUTENTION remains aware of the challenges in its market.

It aims to become a builder at the forefront of efficiency and maintain its proximity with its customers.

The company CHARLATTE MANUTENTION of the future wants to excel continuously by consolidating even more its know-how and its relationship with its customers.
